sourcesContent:
import { useEffect } from 'react' import "../CSS/Benefits.css" export const Benefits = ({ screenWidth }) => { useEffect(() => { const cards = document.getElementsByClassName("card") let maxHeight = 0 for (let i = 0; i < cards.length; i++) { cards[i].style.height = 'auto' const height = cards[i].clientHeight if (maxHeight < height) maxHeight = height } for (let i = 0; i < cards.length; i++) { cards[i].style.height = `${maxHeight * 1.12}px` } }, [screenWidth]) return (

Standard intelligent video security systems using pre-defined parameters fails to identify more complex behaviours and creates false positives, Novatus overcomes these limitations

Context Aware Threat Detection

Identify suspicious behavior patterns like loitering, group formation, and face-covering before an incident unfolds.

Real Time Alerts and Incident Logging

Trigger smart notifications when critical thresholds are crossed. Events are logged with contextual metadata for instant review and response.

Searchable Surveillance with AI Summaries

Find key footage using natural language. Instantly retrieve clips that match queries like “Somebody with a black bag fighting”

) }
